'''19w12b''' is the twenty-eighth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.14]], released on March 21, 2019<ref>{{snap|19w12b|March 21, 2019}}</ref>, which fixes some bugs.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Glass]]'''
* [[Mob]]s no longer suffocate in glass.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Iron golem]]s'''
* Spawn chance has been slightly increased:
** Now requires 5 [[villager]]s to meet instead of 10.
** Villagers that are recently hurt by [[zombie]]s have a higher chance of spawning an iron golem.

'''[[Villager]]s'''
* No longer look at players in Spectator mode.
